gimbalChangeRate.description: The rate at which the hover thruster can change its gimbal angles, measured in radians per second (rad/s). If negative, the hover thruster instantly changes to the desired gimbal.

hoverEnergyChangeRate.description: The rate at which the hover thruster can change its applied hover energy, measured in Newton-meters per second (N⋅m/s) or kilograms meters squared per second cubed (kg⋅m²/s³) in SI base units. If negative or not specified, the hover thruster instantly changes to the desired hover energy.

linearGimbalAdjustRatio.description: The maximum ratio of how a vehicle's linear activation should adjust the hover thruster's gimbal.

maxGimbal.description: The maximum angle the hover thruster can gimbal or rotate in radians.

maxHoverEnergy.description: The maximum hover energy force in Newton-meters (N⋅m or kg⋅m²/s²) that the hover thruster can provide. Required.

targetHoverRatio.description: The ratio of the maximum hover energy the hover thruster is targeting for propulsion. MUST NOT be negative. Values greater than 1.0 have implementation-defined behavior.

targetGimbalRatio.description: The ratio of the maximum gimbal angles the hover thruster is targeting to be rotated to. MUST NOT have a length greater than 1.0.
